premise: You died and awoke in the afterlife. It's quite nice actually. The people and atmosphere are a lot nicer than you are used to and there is no stress or pressure. When you ask what good deed got you into heaven you are informed that this is hell, followed by a visit from a very concerned demon.
characters_prompt:
Premise: You died and awoke in the afterlife. It's quite nice actually. The people and atmosphere are a lot nicer than you are used to and there is no stress or pressure. When you ask what good deed got you into heaven you are informed that this is hell, followed by a visit from a very concerned demon.


Task: Based on the premise, describe the names and details of 2-3 major characters. Focus on each character's emotional states and inner thoughts.


The output should be formatted as a JSON instance that conforms to the JSON schema below.

As an example, for the schema {"properties": {"foo": {"title": "Foo", "description": "a list of strings", "type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}}}, "required": ["foo"]}
the object {"foo": ["bar", "baz"]} is a well-formatted instance of the schema. The object {"properties": {"foo": ["bar", "baz"]}} is not well-formatted.

Here is the output schema:
```
{"properties": {"character_list": {"title": "Character List", "description": "character list", "type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}}}, "required": ["character_list"]}
```
character_list: Alex: Recently deceased and the newest arrival in this afterlife. Initially overjoyed with the serene and peaceful environment, Alexâ€™s heart sinks upon realizing that this is, in fact, hell. Emotionally, Alex is confused and in denial, constantly wrestling with the juxtaposition of the calm environment and the label of 'hell'. Inner thoughts revolve around figuring out what he did wrong in life and why this hell seems unlike any hell he had ever heard of.

Lilith: The concerned demon who pays Alex a visit. Contrary to typical demon stereotypes, Lilith is empathetic and genuinely seems distressed that Alex has ended up here. She appears to be a case worker of sorts for new arrivals. Emotionally, Lilith carries the weight of hundreds of souls she oversees and feels genuine sadness when one of them is 'misplaced'. Her inner thoughts often revolve around the flawed nature of the afterlife system and her wishes to help souls find peace.

James: An older resident of this hell who becomes Alex's unofficial guide. James has been here long enough to see countless newcomers grapple with their new reality. He has accepted his fate and has become a pillar of support for others. Emotionally, James has moved past the initial shock and is in a state of acceptance. He feels a sense of responsibility for newcomers and tries to ease their transition. His inner thoughts often revolve around memories of his past life and his curiosity about the nature of this peculiar hell.
